subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_hi: मेवाड़ पर किस वंश ने शासन किया?
explanation_hi: सिसोदिया वंश ने मेवाड़ पर शासन किया।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Guhil dynasty?
question_hi: गुहिल वंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Guhila was the founder of the Guhil dynasty.
explanation_hi: गूहिल गुहिल वंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following was a notable king of the Pratihar dynasty?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित में से प्रतिहार वंश का एक प्रमुख राजा कौन था?
explanation_en: Nagabhata II was a notable king of the Pratihar dynasty.
explanation_hi: नागभट्ट द्वितीय प्रतिहार वंश के एक प्रमुख राजा थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Chauhan dynasty?
question_hi: चौहान वंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Chahamana was the founder of the Chauhan dynasty.
explanation_hi: चाहमान चौहान वंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following battles was fought between Prithviraj Chauhan and Muhammad Ghori?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित में से कौन सी लड़ाई पृथ्वीराज चौहान और मुहम्मद गोरी के बीच लड़ी गई थी?
explanation_en: The Battle of Tarain was fought between Prithviraj Chauhan and Muhammad Ghori.
explanation_hi: ताराईन की लड़ाई पृथ्वीराज चौहान और मुहम्मद गोरी के बीच लड़ी गई थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the ruler of Mewar during the invasion of Alauddin Khalji?
question_hi: अलाउद्दीन खिलजी के आक्रमण के दौरान मेवाड़ का शासक कौन था?
explanation_en: Rana Ratan Singh was the ruler of Mewar during the invasion of Alauddin Khalji.
explanation_hi: अलाउद्दीन खिलजी के आक्रमण के दौरान मेवाड़ का शासक राणा रतन सिंह था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following was a notable king of the Guhil dynasty?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित में से गुहिल वंश का एक प्रमुख राजा कौन था?
explanation_en: Bappa Rawal was a notable king of the Guhil dynasty.
explanation_hi: बप्पा रावल गुहिल वंश के एक प्रमुख राजा थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the founder of the Sisodia dynasty?
question_hi: सिसोदिया वंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Bappa Rawal was the founder of the Sisodia dynasty.
explanation_hi: बप्पा रावल सिसोदिया वंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Which of the following was a notable battle fought by the Chauhan dynasty?
question_hi: निम्नलिखित में से चौहान वंश द्वारा लड़ी गई एक प्रमुख लड़ाई कौन सी थी?
explanation_en: The Battle of Tarain was a notable battle fought by the Chauhan dynasty.
explanation_hi: ताराईन की लड़ाई चौहान वंश द्वारा लड़ी गई एक प्रमुख लड़ाई थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Pramukh Rajvansh: Guhil-Sisodia (Mewar), Pratihar aur Chauhan
question_en: Who was the last ruler of the Pratihar dynasty?
question_hi: प्रतिहार वंश का अंतिम शासक कौन था?
explanation_en: Mahipala I was the last ruler of the Pratihar dynasty.
explanation_hi: महिपाल प्रथम प्रतिहार वंश के अंतिम शासक थे।
